mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article(article_id, board_id, member_id, subject, content,group_num,step_num, order_num) VALUES(article_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{boardId}, #{memberId}, #{subject}, #{content},article_id_seq.CURRVAL,0, 0)
mapper.select: select COUNT(article_id) count from article where board_id=1

SELECT Count(article_id) count FROM ( SELECT rownum, article_id, subject, member_id, regdate, hitcount FROM article WHERE board_id = 1 AND ${searchType} LIKE ${searchValue} ORDER BY group_num DESC, order_num ASC )

select article_id as "articleId", subject, member_id as "memberId", TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate from( select board_id , article_id, subject, member_id, regdate from article where order_NUM=0 ORDER BY article_id DESC ) where board_id= ${value} and rownum <=5
